Title: Sets forth additional conditions which may be available in an order of protection
Summary: Expands upon conditions which may be included in an order of protection issued for victims of domestic violence; makes other related alterations relative to the jurisdictions of supreme and family court in such situations; provides for payment of housing costs, compensation for incidental losses, possession of specified personal property, and prohibition of alienation of commonly held specified property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to orders of protection
